articles.title: Your next WhatsApp status update could feature a voice message - Business Insider India
articles.description:
1. Your next WhatsApp status update could feature a voice message  Business Insider India

articles.content:
Meta-owned messaging platform WhatsApp is working on a new feature that may allow users to post voice notes on their status updates.
